metadata.dc:title: Celulitis, piomiositis y artritis esternoclavicular por Streptococcus agalactiae en paciente con cirrosis hepática.
[Cellulitis, pyomyositis, and sternoclavicular arthritis due to Streptococcus agalactiae in a patient with liver cirrhosis].
